Text: Me̩ ki bi Jihofa omi iko omi otitala
Uwe̩do̩-mi mutajo bʼamadide ame̩ wño̩re̩ oji ma,
Ugbo-wñ okuta ukpoji alo le̩ akwo wa,
Ma la adab amagbiti ku ma jʼatʼame̩nuja-ma mane̩
Tak u nadʼugbiti ñw unyi Juda,
Nafufo do̩ ma oñ nako ma wa jʼugboʼkate,
Oñ nako ma gbe̩ ef amone̩ ojoji ojoji,
Omi ñʼako ma kwʼojane̩ Ijipti wa ge̩,
Tak i alale gu ef ohimini o̩pe̩cha du,
Oñ nadʼukpahiu ñw ma efu Jihofa
